entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued November 09 at 4:20AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Two Impactful Winter Storms Sunday Through Thursday... Two consecutive winter storms are expected to impact the West Coast and Western Interior starting on Sunday and could bring a combination of winter impacts including heavy snow, strong winds, and the potential for elevated surf along the coast. The first system will bring a strong front to the West Coast on

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued November 09 at 2:32PM EST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Some slippery conditions this evening and overnight... Wet bridges and overpasses may freeze as their temperatures drop to near freezing this evening allowing for locally slick travel. Some gusty snow showers near midnight may cause slick travel conditions and low visibilities in the mountains as well.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Androscoggin; Central Interior Cumberland; Central Somerset; Interior Cumberland Highlands; Interior Waldo; Interior York; Kennebec; Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford; Southern Franklin; Southern Oxford; Southern Somerset
